title: Dawn of Eternal Day
description: Dawn’s life has fallen apart. Instead of going to college, she finds herself broke, unemployed, and single.When her best friend is kidnapped, she starts to wonder if she’s actually losing her mind. Was that a demon she saw at the crime scene? And why doesn’t anyone remember her friend?Homeless and desperate, Dawn finds herself depending on the help of her darkly mysterious neighbor. Turns out, he belongs to a secretive organization called The Academy of Light—along with four other dangerously sexy men. Apparently, the Academy members hunt monsters no one else can see—and Dawn belongs among their ranks.With their protection, Dawn searches for her best friend. But powerful forces want to keep her apart from her guys. If she can’t fight back, she’ll lose not only her best friend--but her life.
author: C.N. Crawford
